author: Mariana Alfaro
title: Midterm primaries live updates Voters to pick key nominees in Pa., N.C., three other states

sentence: Townsend added that Kemp's victory is "very good news" for other Republicans mounting a 2024 presidential campaign, especially Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, because it suggests that Trump's power over the GOP is beginning to wane and that a new White House path is being opened for MAGA hopefuls who aren't Trump.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Trump Sacrificed His Endorsement Record for Georgia Revenge Fantasy
